publicwhip.minor-heading: Advisory Group on Enforcement Service Delivery

speech.p: The fourth and final report by the Lord Chancellor's Advisory Group on Enforcement Service Delivery, entitled The move to a regulated enforcement industry: transitional issues has been published in November 2003 and copies placed in the Libraries of both Houses. I am pleased to announce that the advisory group has now fulfilled its original terms of reference. The group is therefore disbanded. I am grateful for the valuable contribution provided by the members of the advisory group throughout the four reports to my department. Proposals for legislation will follow in due course.
